data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+
data.meta_description: Samsung is the South Korean company which manufactures and launches many smart phones every year. Recently the company has launched new Samsung Galaxy S6 edge plus in market.
data.text:
Samsung is the South Korean company which manufactures and launches many smart phones every year. Recently the company has launched new Samsung Galaxy S6 edge plus in market. This smart phone is the successor of Galaxy S6 edge which was launched last year. There is news that the company is going to launch this smart phone in India by 19th August 2015. Galaxy S6 edge plus will be available in 2 different variant i.e. 32 GB internal storage and 64 GB internal storage capacity.

Specifications

As compare to the Galaxy S6 edge, the new version S6 edge plus is packed with new features, latest hardware and software which are going on in market.

Display

Galaxy S6 edge plus includes the dual edge. It is packed with 5.7 inch Quad HD Super Amoled screen having 1440 x 2560 pixels resolution and 518 pixels per inch (ppi) density. The screen will be build up with Corning Gorilla Glass 4 Black panel. The height is 142.1 mm, width 70.1 mm and depth 7 mm. The display have curved edge screen with multi touch functionality. Samsung is offering Galaxy S6 edge plus with White, Black, Golden, and Silver colours.

Hardware

The new device is powered with company’s own Exynos 7420 SoC,64 bit octa core processor with four cortex A57 cores clocked at 2.1 GHz CPU. There are 2 models available one with 32 GB internal storage where as other with 64 GB internal storage both paired with 4 GB RAM. It does not have micro SD card slot to expand the memory.

Camera

Galaxy S6 edge plus is packed with 16 mega pixel rear camera with f/1.9 aperture and optical image stabilization and flash light. Apart, 5 mega pixel front facing camera which can be used for taking selfies and conducting video calls. The camera opens up either by double tapping on home screen or by keeping fingerprint sensors

Software

A pre-installed Android Lollipop version 5.1 operating system is installed in this smart phone. It supports WiFi having 802.11a/b/g/n/ac standards. Along with WiFi it also supports Bluetooth and GPS. The 3.5 mm headphone slot is available. It supports GSM nano SIM card. It supports both 3G and 4G internet connectivity.

Battery

Galaxy S6 edge plus is having non removable battery with battery life of 3000 mAh. The new feature of fast charging technology is available. This device can be charge both with wired or without wire. It supports both the options WPC and PMA. A rough report, that wireless charging will make battery full within 90 minutes where as wired charging will take a bit time more and would make the battery full within 120 minutes.

Galaxy S6 edge plus are already available in U.S and U.K markets and now by 19th August 2015, this smart phone will be available in Indian market also. The new smart phone will be sold on Samsung’s outlet as well as through online shopping websites.
